description: March 17th is right around the corner, and that means one thing—it's time to celebrate St. Patrick's Day! What better way to get the party started than with some jiggly Green&nbsp;Jello Shots? These&nbsp;shots are packed with lime and&nbsp;vodka flavors, and each mixture makes several servings for your guests. So grab a bowl of green goop and let the festivities begin!
name: Green Jello Shots

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the 1 cup boiling water into the lime jello powder and whisk until fully dissolved.
